=== Other religions ===
 
=== Other religions ===
  +
The [[Hindu]] religion talks about ayurvede, the wisdom of traditional Hindu medicine. Ayurvede means “knowledge of life”. It teaches that the mind and body are one (an ancient wisdom). In ancient times, it was used to try to cure disease. However, today it is used to help people relax and feel healthy.
  +  
In [[Mesopotamian mythology|Mesopotamian religion and mythology]], [[Enki]], also known as Ea, was the God of wisdom and intelligence. Wisdom was achieved by restoring balance.
 
In [[Mesopotamian mythology|Mesopotamian religion and mythology]], [[Enki]], also known as Ea, was the God of wisdom and intelligence. Wisdom was achieved by restoring balance.
